documentation.title: Prefix all Globals
documentation.standard: All globals must be prefixed with a theme/plugin specific term. These prefixes must be distinct and unique to the plugin/theme, in order to prevent potential conflicts with other plugins and themes.

code.title: Invalid: Using a generic prefix of PLUGIN_

documentation.standard: Using any prefixes designated for WordPress are not permitted, even if WordPress has not used the define. This includes all defines such as _() (underscores), __() double underscores, wp_, and wordpress_

code.title: Invalid: Using a two-letter prefix MP_

documentation.standard: Two-letter prefixes should be avoided as many plugins and themes share the same intials.

code.title: Valid: Using the distinct prefix MYPLUGIN_
Invalid: Using a two-letter prefix MP_
